text: True-blue speakeasy cafe based out of Delun's home! Barista roasts his own beans and you won't be able to get his coffee anywhere else. Wife Approved beans are my favourite - tasting notes of fruit wine and oolong comes to live! Remember to make an appointment and also be patient when finding Blk 634A. Totally worth a visit! ‚òïÔ∏è

Easily one of the best coffees I‚Äôve had‚Äîsmooth, rich, and expertly brewed. The owner‚Äôs passion shines through, not just in the coffee but also in the beautifully designed, customizable packaging. Even non-coffee drinkers are in for a treat with his amazing specialty drinks. Perfect for a treat or a unique gift!

If you're looking for a truly unique and memorable coffee experience, look no further than Spilled Roaster & Brews. This cozy little gem hidden in Tampines North offers an immaculate vibe that instantly makes you feel at home.

The owner, Delun, is the heart and soul of this place‚Äîfriendly, approachable, and incredibly knowledgeable about coffee. What makes Spilled truly special is that he roasts his own espresso beans in-house, operating a micro roastery that allows him to experiment and craft his own unique blends. His passion for coffee is evident in every sip, and it's clear that he puts his ‚ù§Ô∏è into every step of the process, from roasting to brewing.

The coffee here is simply divine‚Äîrich, flavorful, and expertly crafted. Whether you're a coffee connoisseur or just someone who enjoys a good brew, you'll appreciate the care and creativity that goes into each cup.

Overall, Spilled Roaster & Brews is a must-visit for anyone who appreciates great-tasting coffee, a cozy ambience, and a touch of creativity. The combination of a micro roastery, unique blends, and the owner‚Äôs warm hospitality makes this place truly one-of-a-kind. I can't recommend it enough!

An absolute gem! Always a delight to support home businesses. His coffee-making skills are on par and even better than cafe standard. My go-to order is usually "wife approved" and "nut bar" ‚Äî coffee temperature has been consistent. The warm and welcoming atmosphere makes every visit a pleasure. Highly recommend this place to anyone looking for great coffee and friendly service! üòÄ

Spilled Roasters and Brews is a true gem! Their cafes feel like a warm hug, with a cozy atmosphere that's perfect for relaxing or catching up with friends.

The coffee is consistently amazing, whether you're enjoying a latte at the counter or brewing their beans at home. Spilled Roasters surpasses the typical cafe experience in every way ‚Äì the quality, the ambiance, it's all top-notch.
